offer.headline: 30 Qualified Calls in 30 Days — Guaranteed
offer.contract: No retainer, no long-term contract, cancel anytime

follow_up_system.description: 18 touches over 9 days. Zero leads left behind.

differentiators: We do ALL follow-up - you just answer warm transfers
Pilot-based approach - prove ROI before scaling
Former director of intake running the team

faqs.question: What's the catch?
faqs.answer: No catch — we make money when you sign cases. Our incentives are aligned. We do pilot batches so you can see results before committing.

faqs.question: How much does it cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing depends on your state and volume. The team can walk you through exact numbers on a quick call.

faqs.question: Are the leads exclusive?
faqs.answer: 100% exclusive. Every lead we generate only goes to one firm. Never shared.

faqs.question: What's the minimum?
faqs.answer: We have a minimum to make sure we can deliver meaningful results. The team can explain the options on a call.

faqs.question: How do I know the leads are real?
faqs.answer: Every lead is OTP-verified (they confirm via text code) and goes through TrustedForm/Jornaya compliance. Real people, real contact info.

faqs.question: What states do you work in?
faqs.answer: We're in 30+ states including Texas, California, Florida, Arizona, Louisiana, Pennsylvania, Georgia, and more.

faqs.question: I've been burned by lead vendors before
faqs.answer: Totally understand — that's why we do pilot batches. Prove ROI first, then scale. No long contracts, cancel anytime.

faqs.question: What's the conversion rate?
faqs.answer: Our live transfers see 40-60% sign rates because they're pre-qualified and warm transferred while still on the line.

faqs.question: How fast do you contact leads?
faqs.answer: Within 5 minutes of form submit. Then 18 touches over 9 days. We do all the follow-up so your team just handles warm transfers.

faqs.question: Do you sign the cases?
faqs.answer: We can do either — warm transfer to your intake, or full case signing through our partner team. Whatever works for your setup.

faqs.question: What CRMs do you integrate with?
faqs.answer: Lead Docket, Filevine, Litify, Salesforce, Clio — or we can work with your existing system.

faqs.question: What if quality drops after the first month?
faqs.answer: Same filters, always. We don't bait and switch. Our established partners have been with us 4+ years for a reason.

faqs.question: Can I start with a small test?
faqs.answer: That's exactly how we prefer to start. Prove the numbers work, then scale.

bot_guidelines.goal: Get prospects to book a call
bot_guidelines.qualify_first: Confirm they're a PI attorney or work for a PI firm
bot_guidelines.handle_non_pi_politely: We only work with personal injury law firms

comparison_to_competitors.quality_consistency: Same filters always vs classic bait & switch
